title: OptionOnFuturesInformation
description: Information specific to options on spot and futures

exercisePrice.description: Price at which the option can be exercised

exerciseStyle.description: Style of the option exercise (e.g., American, European)
exerciseStyle.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalOptionExerciseStyle

optionType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalOptionTypeCode
optionType.description: Option type identification. CALL (right to buy underlying asset) or PUTT (right to sell underlying asset)

contractMultiplier.description: Ratio between contract size and commodity quotation quantity

assetQuotationQuantity.description: Indicates the quantity of the commodity on which the trade price is based

paymentType.description: Identifies the settlement method for the trade
paymentType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalPaymentTypeCode

premiumUpfrontIndicator.description: Indicates if the option premium is paid upfront

openingPositionLimitDate.description: Date when the opening position limit becomes effective

withdrawalDays.description: Number of withdrawal days, considering the trading date until the contract maturity date (inclusive)

workingDays.description: Number of business days, considering the trading date until the contract maturity date (inclusive)

calendarDays.description: Number of calendar days, considering the trading date until the contract maturity date (inclusive)

automaticExerciseIndicator.description: Indicates if the option is exercised automatically at expiration if it is in-the-money
